roleset.name: move swiftly like water
roleset.note: COURSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'course' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Fluidic motion. That has to be a first. (from course.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: a horse is a horse...
example.text: When that happened, ``seismic'' tremors of fear -- much like the shock waves created by an earthquake -- coursed through the market and increased the market's volatility.
